ext_description.note: The local rules for this entity have not been fully updated to agree with the changes in clause 4.2.
ext_description.p: An interconnect_module_macro_component_join_terminal is a that implements the ARM concept of internal.ref Linkend="Interconnect_module_macro_component_join_terminal">

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The interconnect_module_macro_component_join_terminal shall not have a description of 'bare die component terminal', 'component termination passage join terminal', 'conductive interconnect element terminal', 'interconnect component join terminal', 'assembly module component terminal', 'land join terminal', 'minimally defined component terminal', 'non functional land join terminal', 'packaged component join terminal', 'printed component join terminal', 'package terminal occurrence', or 'via terminal'.
